AI Description: DFTB+ is a software package for efficient, approximate density functional based tight-binding (DFTB) calculations in quantum chemistry and solid-state physics. It offers a computationally less expensive alternative to density functional theory (DFT) for large-scale simulations.
Core Features: 1. Approximate density functional based tight-binding (DFTB) method. 2. Efficient calculations in quantum chemistry and solid-state physics. 3. Suitable for large-scale simulations. 4. Includes various parameter sets for different chemical elements. 5. Compatible with periodic and non-periodic systems.
General Tags: Quantum Chemistry, Solid-State Physics, Density Functional Theory, Computational Chemistry
